abstract: Gale Gillingham, a Hall of Fame guard, was an unusual combination of power and technique.
snippet: Gale Gillingham, a Hall of Fame guard, was an unusual combination of power and technique.
lead_paragraph: In the era before offensive linemen were allowed to open their hands and extend their arms, for both run and pass blocking, Gale Gillingham was an unusual combination of power and technique. Gillingham died on Thursday at his home in Minnesota. He was 67. A few thoughts:

headline.main: Gale Gillingham, a Packers Hall of Famer
